message: Let's split the money 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer considering the inflation working against you.
Your split seems unfair considering the inflation. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
I understand your concern about the inflation, but your previous offer wasn't fair to me. This is my counter-offer. Let's be reasonable and close the deal.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We both lose if this drags on.
